definition: typical of tabloids, yellow color or pigment, turn yellow
details:
adjective
- typical of tabloids
= synonyms: scandalmongering
- easily frightened
= synonyms: chicken
- of the color intermediate between green and orange in the color spectrum
= synonyms: xanthous
- affected by jaundice which causes yellowing of skin etc
= synonyms: jaundiced, icteric
- cowardly or treacherous
= example: cowardly or treacherous
- changed to a yellowish color by age
= example: changed to a yellowish color by age
= synonyms: yellowed
noun
- yellow color or pigment
= synonyms: yellowness
verb
- turn yellow
= example: turn yellow
